King of Bidar is a 2023 Indian Kannada-language action drama film directed by Sudeep K and produced by Shilpa Shetty under Raghavendra Art Productions. The film stars Rishab Shetty in the lead role alongside Shraddha Srinath and Rangayana Raghu.
Plot
The film follows Vijay, a former gangster who returns to his ancestral village in Bidar to protect his family from political corruption.
Cast
* Savan Sagar
* Vidyashree P
* Sapna Raj"IMDb"/>

Production
Principal photography began in January 2023 in Bidar, with additional shooting in Bengaluru. The film was shot using ARRI Alexa LF cameras with Panavision lenses.
Soundtrack
The music was composed by V. Harikrishna, marking his 100th film as a composer:
# "Apple Cake Song O Geleya" (released 15 October 2023)
# "Ninna Naa Kanda" (released 15 November 2023)
Release
The film was released theatrically on 24 November 2023 across Karnataka. It began streaming on ZEE5 from 15 December 2023.
Reception
Critical response
The Hindu praised Rishab Shetty's "powerhouse performance" but criticized the "predictable second half".
